resources.string: This phone companion app was created for you to directly open share links on the WearOS main app. (Currently supporting KMB App, Citybus App & hkbus.app links)
To do that, just use the \"Share this route\" button in one of the supported apps and click this companion app when the share menu is shown.
All other main functionalities are contained inside the WearOS app!
If you haven\'t already downloaded HK Bus ETA on your watch, click the button below!
This is not a support bus route link
